name: Flip the Grenade
description:
Flip the Grenade is a fast paced arcade action game where your only goal is to flip the grande on the highest level. If you already tired of flipping gun and knife then you will definitely enjoy brand new grenade and bomb action!

Throw flippy grenades way up to the top, beat dozens of levels, unlock new grenades and bombs and watch out for the timer! Easy to use and intuitive controls, both challenging and arcade gameplay will catch your attention for a long time! Master your skills, target carefully and become grenade master! Good luck!
